about_the_game:
As a park ranger at Mountain View National Park, your job can be pretty mundane -- except for tonight. Something is lurking among the trees and bushes, and now a camper has disappeared. People have reported strange noises, loud stomping, and odd track prints, but no one has spotted any large animals in the area. Is it just another bear, or something.... worse?

Play as the park ranger to discover the true reason why campers have been going missing in this first-person, stealth-based horror game. Use your evasiveness skills and tools around you to explore the park for signs of what may have happened to the missing camper. Your flashlight battery is limited so remember to conserve power!
detailed_description:
As a park ranger at Mountain View National Park, your job can be pretty mundane -- except for tonight. Something is lurking among the trees and bushes, and now a camper has disappeared. People have reported strange noises, loud stomping, and odd track prints, but no one has spotted any large animals in the area. Is it just another bear, or something.... worse?

Play as the park ranger to discover the true reason why campers have been going missing in this first-person, stealth-based horror game. Use your evasiveness skills and tools around you to explore the park for signs of what may have happened to the missing camper. Your flashlight battery is limited so remember to conserve power!

name: Ranger Danger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 2500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon™ R9 390X (or equivalent with 4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 6 GB GDDR6
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: A park ranger's life is changed forever as they discover what really lurks in their national park. A first-person horror, exploration, and stealth-based game.
